title: Colosseum
author: Unknown
pages:
The Colosseum is a...
ah forget it, you know
what the Colosseum is.









But why is it in
Argentina?

As we all know, the
Romans discovered
the Americas first.

Thats a joke.

Argentina during the
early 1900s had a
large wave of Italian
immigration. Many
Southern Italians, due
to crippling poverty,
moved to the New York
in the U.S., and to
Argentina.

In the early 1900s,
you would have heard
more Italian in
Argentina than

Spanish on the
streets!

As to why the
Colosseum to
represent this?
eh its cool

Anyways.
+2 Culture
+2 Loyalty
+2 Amenities to all
cities within 6 tiles.
-ptero
